data.title: Where is Zurich, Switzerland?
data.text:
The given Zurich location map shows that Zurich is ocated in north-central Switzerland. It is the largest city in Switzerland and the capital of the canton of Zurich.

Location Map of Zurich, Switzerland

About Map: The map showing location of Zurich in Switzerland.

Where is Zurich Located?

Zurich, largest city of Switzerland and capital of the canton of Zurich. with a population of 434,335 As of January 2020. Zurich is located in the north of Switzerland. It is at the northern end of Lake ZÃ¼rich and is surrounded by hills. Its financial, cultural, and industrial centre of Switzerland.
